title: White Sands National Monument: Employees of White Sands National Monument
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories     Employees of White Sands National Monument                Employees of White Sands National Monument        NPS Photo       When you visit White Sands National Monument , you may see and talk to an interpretive ranger who works in the visitor center and provides ranger-guided programs. You may also see the law enforcement rangers, who work to keep you and the monument safe. There are many other employees and volunteers who work behind the scenes. All of them work hard to protect the resource and make your stay enjoyable. From the superintendent to the maintenance staff, each employee’s job is crucial to keeping White Sands running smoothly. Learn more about what monument employees do every day at White Sands by reading the stories below.
